name: Spend a Weekend with Sashi
description:
Sashi Nismin. The iconic blonde girl from H boy and friends stars in her first ever visual novel. Try to win her heart by doing everything for her.  Treat her to milkshakes, work your little arms off doing odd jobs to buy her tickets to her favorite boy band.  Play games with her at the arcade. Basically do anything you possible can to get Sashi to fall for you but watch out. You never know which way the game will take you so keep your wits about you and pay attention. Watch out for trouble at all costs. 

And remember: The Developer loves you.

Character's made with Sutemo sprites 

Note: This is only the first version and its kind of short. Don't worry, soon it will get longer as the game progresses and I start to release other versions with more activities as I get more and more used to the Ren'py software
